features: 【More Capacity More Power Upgrade】Notice: The four complimentary balls are placed in the washing machine to prevent clothes from getting tangled.Compared with other folding mini 6L capacity washing machines on the market, the capacity of our mini washing machine reaches 11.7L, the rated power of other products on the market is only 10W-30W, but our product's rated power is 60W. Although they can only wash small items such as underwear, socks, baby clothes, small towels, etc., in general, our RRAIZ product has a larger capacity and more powerful.

【Portable Washing Machine】The body weighs of our washer is only 3.5 lbs, compact and easy to carry, ideal for your apartment, dorm, hotel, travel or camping! Our portable mini washing machine is made of TPE and silicone material. It's also an good ideal gift choice for you! 【Please note】Portable washer come with a Drain basket.Using the drain function, the small object just won't drip, it won't completely dry the clothes, but it may also be a good feature for girls who don't want to damage their beautiful nails.

【Easy operation】 This folding washing machine has semi-automatic washing function, it has three washing modes, 1. Drain mode: The split drain basket is put together and placed on the washing machine wheel, this function takes 3 minutes; 2. Quick cleaning function: Using this function, the wave wheel of the washing machine rotates in the positive and negative direction to simulate hand washing clothes, which takes 10 minutes; 3. Regular mode, this mode takes only 5 minutes, if you are in a hurry, you can use this mode. Three simple features make it easy for you to complete various washing requirements. [PS. Add 2/3 water to the washing machine for better washing effect.

【Hidden drain pipe】Unlike other mini folding washing machines, they only have one drain, which is very inconvenient to drain water everywhere when draining, but there is a drain pipe hidden at the bottom of our washing machine. Before washing, the drain pipe is hung on the hole on the top of the washing machine to prevent water from flowing out. After washing, there is no need to pour water, just put the drain pipe on the wash basin.

【1 Year Warranty】Our portable washing machine can provide 1 year warranty, if you have any questions, please contact us, we will provide you with satisfactory customer service. Contact Us - Log into your Amazon account > select "Your Orders" > find the order ID > click "Contact Seller"

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The second washer of the house ! Product concept: This mini folding portable washing machine is designed with the idea - to be the second washing machine in our family! Like socks, bra, underwear, baby clothes, these intimate clothes, we usually need to wash them separately from ordinary clothes, but these clothes can take more time and money to wash in the big washing machine or take to the laundry room. This mini washer can solve this problem very well. It is also a great product for schools, apartments, motorhomes and outdoor camping. This folding washing machine has semi-automatic washing function, it has three washing modes, 1. Drain mode: The split drain basket is put together and placed on the washing machine wheel, this function takes 3 minutes; 2. Quick cleaning function: Using this function, the wave wheel of the washing machine rotates in the positive and negative direction to simulate hand washing clothes, which takes 10 minutes; 3. Regular mode, this mode takes only 5 minutes, if you are in a hurry, you can use this mode. Three simple features make it easy for you to complete various washing requirements. [PS. Add 2/3 water to the washing machine for better washing effect.
Product parameter Capacity:11.7L Rated power:60W Rated voltage:110-240V NW:4.63LB Unfold Size:11.8*11.8*11.8 inch Fold Size:11.8*11.8*5.51 inch
Simulated hand washing The wave wheel of the washing machine rotates in the positive and negative direction at regular intervals to simulate hand washing.

Drainage mode The hidden drain pipe can be hidden in the bottom of the washing machine when the washing machine is not in use. When the washing machine is working, we have to hang the drain pipe above the body to prevent water from coming out. When you finish washing, direct the drain to the sink and let the water drain automatically, so you don't have to pour the water manually.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do NOT waste your money
reviews.reviewText: This is a terrible washer. The buttons are stickers. Each time you turn it on again, you have to unplug the unit and plug it back and with wet hands, well, that's dangerous. It doesn't spin properly. Spin basket fits a pair of socks. You're better off hand washing your items. What a mess this makes and what a waste of time and money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Just tried this product. It looks nice, has the latest design among similar products; it has the largest capacity of 11.5 liters; it has the best appearance and the best price; the color is also good-looking; Socks and underwear should not be washed by hand every day when I go camping in the future. It is lightweight and easy to carry. My daughter's clothes can also be washed separately without the washing machine. It can be tumbled dry after washing; it is indeed a fully functional product at the same price; it is the best priced product and is worth recommending.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I have mixed feels about it
reviews.reviewText: This is for my RV, it seemed to work very well if you are trying to wash a shirt at a time but the drying absolutely sucks, I might as well squeeze the water with my hands. I was really hoping it drys a little bit better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super cheap. Comes with random small wheels with no explanation as to what they are or are used for. The "buttons" and "display" are a sticker that was actually laying in the bottom of the box when it arrived and not actually covering the area it is supposed to. Very poorly made and very low quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only washes 4 ladies underware at a time. The time it takes to fill the tub, 10 min wash, drain the tub, fill the tub with rinse water and hand ring out clothes, put in spin basket, wait for spin to stop, clothes still dripping, wait to spin again you could just do the hand washing youself in half the time with less water and save electricty. With plenty of water in the tub and only 4 small items it sounds like it's on it's last legs. I would not recommend this waste of time machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Basket is so small, can only be used for very small items

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Useful Portable Washing Machine good for travel
